DOC.detailed_description: The overall objective determine whether predictive value plasma concentration select nutrient biomarker ( ) food intake determine use single plasma sample either alone combination strong , objective predictor subsequent death CHD MI compare select food intake data derive subjective , self-reported food frequency questionnaire . The nutrient biomarkers ( phospholipid [ PL ] eicosapentaenoic acid [ EPA ] , PL docosahexaenoic acid [ DHA ] , PL trans fatty acid , phylloquinone , dihydrophylloquinone ) food ( fish , dark fish tuna , vegetable , fruit , whole grain , unsaturated fat rich food ) target previously either directly indirectly associate CVD risk . We propose test overall objective conducting nest case-control study use plasma sample food frequency data observational cohort Women 's Health Initiative ( WHI ) . Our case ( n=1200 ) select subset woman report dietary supplement use die CHD MI ( collectively refer WHI CHD case ) . The control subject ( n=1200 ) select subset free CHD MI event match case standard National Cholesterol Education Program ( NCEP ) risk factor ( WHI control ) .
